Template & Studio


Managing Templates
Template Categories

4 min
to provide an easy search console, assigning a category to each product template is very important your system comes with 50+ pre built template categories that you can edit, delete and assign to a sub category a template category will help you group templates with the same characteristics as well as, and it will help customers find the correct template as per their design requirements if a category is assigned to each template, then those categories appear on your website as shown in the above picture customers can click on any of their desired categories and browse from the templates falling into them add a template category the template category dashboard lists all the categories created along with the details of their parent category (if any) click on the add button to add a new template category to add a new template category, all you have to do is enter the template name, define the url for the template category, and give a sort order for a template, a category name chooses a name that will define a class or division of product templates as having a particular shared category template category action menu the template category’s action menu has a lot of other courses of action that you can implement edit a quick link to modify the template’s name, category url, and sort order view templates this link will redirect you to the product templates page and list out all the templates associated with the category this will help you to check the templates before deleting any category add sub category some broad categories can have several sub categories for example, the category "gift items" can be divided into store gifts, birthday gifts, anniversary gifts, etc the sub categories are displayed on the website in the following manner – metatags these tags define the content of the template category page for seo rankings you can enter a page title, keywords, and description for the same delete a two step delete function to permanently delete the template category before deleting the template, the system will ask you to choose another template category the templates associated with the old category will be assigned once selected from the dropdown assigning a new template category will save you from losing template data
